title: Basics of Sewing
headline: Learn to sew in this free online course that covers basic hand-stitching and explains how to use a sewing machine.
description: Are you ready to take up the needle and thread for the first time? Is it finally time to take that new sewing machine out of its box? This sewing course gets you started by taking you through the basics to lay a solid foundation in this craft. We go through the essentials of sewing step by step to help you master the necessary skills. We provide a range of sewing techniques and describe the equipment you can use at home to become your own tailor.
courseDescription:
This course lays out each stage of the sewing process in depth. It starts with an introduction to the various parts of a sewing machine as we examine its accessories and features. Knowing the different types of sewing machines gives you an extra edge and we compare various models available on the market.

We then describe the various tools needed for the sewing process, starting with hand-stitching. Any aspiring sewing enthusiast requires a thorough understanding of thread functions and we lay out the different types of threads. To help you become an expert at sewing and embroidery, we explore the fundamental factors of fabrics and various stitches.

The course then covers employing patterns, pattern envelopes and their usage. We outline the cutting and marking process and its role as part of your final preparations before sewing. You will then learn how to sew seams, hand stitches and hems. Finally, we explain how to maintain a sewing machine to keep it working properly. Sewing is an ancient skill that never goes out of style and changes with shifts in new technology. So sign up to unleash your creative skills and become your own tailor.
